PerformanceLongAnimationFrameTimingToJSO.summary: The toJSON() method of the interface is a {{Glossary("Serialization","serializer")}}; it returns a JSON representation of the PerformanceLongAnimationFrameTiming object.
PerformanceLongAnimationFrameTimingToJSO.returns: A {{jsxref("JSON")}} object that is the serialization of the object.
